آرسنل نے 1993 میں ایف اے کپ جیتا۔: Did Arsenal win the FA Cup in 1993? Arsenal FA Cup 1993 winner

The 1992–93 FA Cup was the 112th season of the FA Cup, also known as The Football Association Challenge Cup. It was won by Arsenal, who beat Sheffield Wednesday 2–1 in the replay after a 1–1 draw in the final at the old Wembley Stadium.
Did Arsenal win the FA Cup in 1993? Arsenal FA Cup 1993 winner
